      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds the passed property to the list of the player's properties that the player owns
      boolean Player.hasProp(Property p)
      Searches through the ArrayList of Property objects that holds all of the properties and returns a boolean value declaring the property is or isn't owned by the player owned by the player
      void Player.removeProp(Property p)
      Removes the passed property from the list of the player's owned properties
